SCREENSIZE_DOC: Folder for Spectrum. Custom folder are in /data/INTERNAL/PeppySppectrum/Templates/ and must be named weightxheight+numberofbar-description. ex 800x480+30-30-collection. If number of bars omitted, defaut value 30 is used
CHOOSE_SPECTRUM_DOC: Select the Spectrum in the list
NBARCHANGE: Number of bars in Spectrum changed! Now set to
SPECTRUM_FOLDER_NAME: Can't determine screen size because the folder is not properly named!,Must be widthxheight+bars-description ex : 800x600+30-metal. No 'x' allowed in description! please check!
